name: jellyfish-meeting-room
description:
You're in the 'Jellyfish' meeting room. The carpet in here is a rather vivid green and the walls are a tasteful wipe-clean pale blue.
It's a not-to-subtle under-sea kindof theme.
Through the window to the north you can see the main office stairs.
You ponder who's going to spill their coffee out there today.

inventory.detailedDescription: It's bright green. Not really the colour of the sea floor but it lightens the place up a bit.

inventory.name: wall
inventory.detailedDescription: They're pale-blue and wipe-clean to act as a useful 'whiteboard' space.
It's not the greatest view you could get from a meeting room.
